## IsTypingParams.typing property

Indicates whether the text input is part of a typing sequence (i.e. into an editor) This can change a few semantics.

e.g. Pressing enter by default fires: `keydown` , `keyup` however when pressed in a text editor it fires: `keydown` , `keypress`<!-- -->, `keyup`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
typing: boolean;
```
